name: Gods Will Be Watching
summary: Gods Will Be Watching is a minimalistic “point and click thriller” centered on despair, commitment, and sacrifice as players face intriguing puzzles and tough decisions that will affect their entire crew’s wellbeing.
info:
• 中文名: 天在看
  • 开发: Deconstructeam
  • 发行: Devolver Digital
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: 冒险 独立
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2014年7月24日
  • 售价: 9.99$
  • 官方网站: www.deconstructeam.com/games/gods-will-be-watching/
